$correlationId.title: String
$correlationId.description: The ID for this loan request stream. Should be a UUID.

$causationId.title: String
$causationId.description: The UUID for the event that caused this event. Should be a UUID.

transactionTimestamp.title: String
transactionTimestamp.description: The timestamp at which this event was created.

title: Metadata
description: Metadata for all Loan Application events.
